Windlord/Termitron/Nightlight::

Termitron quikly hadn opened the door when he heard Windlord's voice 
and he had a big surprice when he saw a Windlord, Aerotaur and 
Nighlight ant two unknow bots. The bug-bot let them come in all.

Windlord "Follow this corridor, when it end you will find a door. 
There's the medical bay... but I'm afraid that this ship hasn't 
energy for a cr -I'll fly to Perplex's ship in order to bring energon 
for the cr... Where're the others?"

"I... send them to medical bay..." said weakly Nighlight, the pain 
that she felt was increasing "I thought that... they will be safe 
there..."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He picks up Nightlight and brings her into the base.  He then 
realizes 
> he's never been inside and runs back out of the base.  "Windlord 
where's the 
> med lab?"  He finally notices the new bot.  "Thanks for the help 
before."
